body.bibl: Bledsoe, Seth A. “The Relationship between the Elephantine Ahiqar Sayings and Later Recensions: A Preliminary Analysis of the Development and Diffusion of the Ahiqar Tradition.” In Enoncés Sapientiels: Traductions, Traducteurs et Contextes Culturels, edited by Marie-Christine Bornes-Varol and Marie-Sol Ortola, 227–54. Aliento: Echanges Sapientiels En Méditerranée 4. Nancy: Presses universitaires de Nancy, 2013.
